actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agency Administration.

official_title: A bill to allow the adjudication for claims against the United States for damages arising from the activities of the Army Corps of Engineers at the Clarence Cannon Dam project on the Salt River in the State of Missouri.

summary.text: Permits any person who suffered crop or building damage on or after January 1, 1981, due to the activities of the Army Corps of Engineers at the Clarence Cannon Dam project on the Salt River, Missouri, to file a claim against the United States in accordance with this Act.

titles.title: A bill to allow the adjudication for claims against the United States for damages arising from the activities of the Army Corps of Engineers at the Clarence Cannon Dam project on the Salt River in the State of Missouri.
